text: Snikch has all sorts of heinous weapons at his disposal, including a virulent, incurable contagion that can cripple a landâ€™s population for an extended period.\\n\\n[[col:yellow]]Snikch's contagion limits recruitment, reduces [[img:icon_growth]][[/img]]growth and causes [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attrition to local forces in a region.\\n\\n[[col:red]][[img:icon_turns]][[/img]]Snikch recovery time: 5 turns\\n[[img:icon_turns]][[/img]]Action cooldown time: 50 turns[[/col]]
